trans-unit.source: Implements a markup extension that supports static (XAML load time) resource references made from XAML.
trans-unit.target: 实现支持静态 （XAML 加载时间） 资源的标记扩展从 XAML 引用。

trans-unit.source: This class is a markup extension implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此类是标记扩展实现。

trans-unit.source: Markup extension classes in WPF exist mainly to provide infrastructure support for some aspect of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] XAML processor implementation, and the members exposed by a markup extension are not typically called from user code.
trans-unit.target: 在 WPF 中的标记扩展类存在主要是为了提供的某些方面的基础结构支持[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]XAML 处理器实现，并公开标记扩展的成员不通常称为从用户代码。

trans-unit.source: This extension supports the [StaticResource Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) usage from XAML.
trans-unit.target: 此扩展插件支持[否则标记扩展](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)从 XAML 用法。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the mechanics of static resource lookup in WPF XAML, see [StaticResource Markup Extension](../Topic/StaticResource%20Markup%20Extension.md) or [XAML Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关 WPF XAML 中的静态资源查找的机制的详细信息，请参阅[否则标记扩展](../Topic/StaticResource%20Markup%20Extension.md)或[XAML 资源](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: `{StaticResource}` is a markup extension that is specific to the WPF implementation of XAML.
trans-unit.target: `{StaticResource}`是标记扩展的特定于 WPF XAML 实现。

trans-unit.source: You can use `{StaticResource}` when referencing the default XAML namespace for WPF, without using a prefix.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用`{StaticResource}`时引用 for WPF 中，而无需使用作为前缀的默认 XAML 命名空间。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, markup extensions that are defined for XAML language support (such as `{x:Type}`) require the prefix for the XAML language XAML namespace in the usage.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，为 XAML 语言定义的标记扩展支持 (如`{x:Type}`) 需要用法在 XAML 语言 XAML 命名空间前缀。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Markup Extensions and WPF XAML](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[标记扩展和 WPF XAML](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Static resource references are generally used in XAML whenever a [DynamicResource Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) is not explicitly necessary.
trans-unit.target: 在 XAML 中通常使用静态资源引用每当[DynamicResource 标记扩展](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)没有显式必要。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage See Remarks
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文本使用情况，请参阅备注

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.StaticResourceExtension"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.StaticResourceExtension"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.StaticResourceExtension"></xref> class, with the provided initial key.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.StaticResourceExtension"></xref>类，提供的初始密钥。

trans-unit.source: The key of the resource that this markup extension references.
trans-unit.target: 此标记扩展所引用的资源键。

trans-unit.source: resourceKey parameter is , either through markup extension usage or explicit construction.
trans-unit.target: resourceKey参数是 ，通过标记扩展用法或显式构造。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object that should be set on the property where this extension is applied.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个应在应用了此扩展的属性设置的对象。

trans-unit.source: For <xref href="System.Windows.StaticResourceExtension"></xref>, this is the object found in a resource dictionary, where the object to find is identified by the <xref:System.Windows.StaticResourceExtension.ResourceKey*>.
trans-unit.target: 有关<xref href="System.Windows.StaticResourceExtension"> </xref>，这是要查找的对象由<xref:System.Windows.StaticResourceExtension.ResourceKey*>.</xref:System.Windows.StaticResourceExtension.ResourceKey*>的资源字典中找到的对象

trans-unit.source: This method supports [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] XAML processor implementation, and is not intended to be called directly.
trans-unit.target: 此方法支持[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]XAML 处理器实现，不应直接调用。

trans-unit.source: The XAML processor implementation uses this method for proper handling of `StaticResource` extension values during object creation.
trans-unit.target: XAML 处理器实现使用此方法进行正确处理`StaticResource`对象创建期间的扩展值。

trans-unit.source: The property to be set can be identified by a <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo> (standard property) or <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty> (dependency property).
trans-unit.target: 要设置的属性可以由标识<xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo>（标准属性） 或<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty>（依赖项属性）。</xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty> </xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo>

trans-unit.source: This implementation relies on XAML-related services based on the passed `serviceProvider`.
trans-unit.target: 此实现依赖于与 XAML 相关服务基于已传递`serviceProvider`。

trans-unit.source: It must not be `null`.
trans-unit.target: 不得为`null`。

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] implementation, the following are required services from service context: - <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlSchemaContextProvider> - <xref:System.Xaml.IAmbientProvider> - <xref:System.Xaml.IRootObjectProvider> If any of these services are missing, usage of the markup extension throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]实现中，以下是所需的服务，从服务上下文:- <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlSchemaContextProvider>- <xref:System.Xaml.IAmbientProvider>-<xref:System.Xaml.IRootObjectProvider>标记扩展用法如果缺少任何这些服务，将引发异常。</xref:System.Xaml.IRootObjectProvider> </xref:System.Xaml.IAmbientProvider> </xref:System.Xaml.IXamlSchemaContextProvider>

trans-unit.source: Object that can provide services for the markup extension.
trans-unit.target: 可为标记扩展提供服务的对象。

trans-unit.source: The object value to set on the property where the markup extension provided value is evaluated.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中计算的标记扩展提供值的属性上设置的对象值。

trans-unit.source: serviceProvider was , or failed to implement a required service.
trans-unit.target: serviceProvider已 ，或无法实现所需的服务。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key value passed by this static resource reference.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置通过此静态资源引用传递的密钥值。

trans-unit.source: They key is used to return the object matching that key in resource dictionaries.
trans-unit.target: 键用于返回与该资源字典中的键匹配的对象。

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage information, see [StaticResource Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]使用情况信息，请参阅[否则标记扩展](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文本用法

trans-unit.source: The resource key for a resource.
trans-unit.target: 资源的资源键。

trans-unit.source: Specified value as <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, either through markup extension usage or explicit construction.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值作为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，通过标记扩展用法或显式构造。
